definition: sharp and clear/crisp/melodious/ringing/tinkling/silvery (of sound)/fragile/frail/also written 輕脆|轻脆
(of speech or actions) direct and efficient/without fooling around
see 乾脆利落|干脆利落[gan1 cui4 li4 luo5]
crispy/thin and brittle/a crispy fried cracker

sentences.english: This is American Kraft cheese and crackers, sir.
sentences.chinese: 先生，这是美国克拉特乳酪和脆饼干。

sentences.english: Iron-deficiency anemia can lead to a pale color along with a thin, brittle, ridged texture.
sentences.chinese: 缺铁性贫血会导致苍白的颜色和薄，脆，纵横条纹。

sentences.english: Manganese is a hard, brittle, gray-white metal.
sentences.chinese: 锰是一种灰白色的，又硬又脆的金属。

sentences.english: Particular kind of fragrant crisp varieties, the most to my appetite.
sentences.chinese: 特别是那种又香又脆的品种，最合我的胃口。

sentences.english: I love cornflake, it is nice and crispy.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢玉米片，又脆又好吃。

sentences.english: The roast Beijing duck is delicious. Its skin is really crispy.
sentences.chinese: 北京烤鸭味道极好，烤鸭皮又脆又香。

sentences.english: A special brittle ductile shear zone crops out in the Baisha town of Luyan county, western Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 湘西泸阳县白沙镇西发育了一条特殊的脆韧性剪切带。

sentences.english: In autumn and winter, the air was crispy and sweet, like biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 秋天和冬天，空气脆而甜润，像夹心饼干。

sentences.english: In the southern city, authentic crackers and steamed rice cakes are famous.
sentences.chinese: 而在南部城市，地道的脆薄饼和蒸米糕都很知名。

sentences.english: They were fragile and prone to tearing, and the messages recorded on them soon wore out.
sentences.chinese: 锡箔又薄又脆容易撕裂，录在上面的信息会很快磨损。

sentences.english: He chopped a banana, to put on top of the girls’ cornflakes.
sentences.chinese: 他剁碎了一只香蕉，要放在女孩儿们的脆玉米片上。

sentences.english: Shortbread is so named because of its crumbly texture.
sentences.chinese: 这个酥饼因其脆脆的表面和纹理而得名。

sentences.english: It's characterized by it's crispy bottom that is pan fried after it is steamed.
sentences.chinese: 蒸过后再用平底锅煎，包子底又脆又香，别具特色。

sentences.english: The shelves are loaded with old musty books whose pages have become yellowish.
sentences.chinese: 书架上堆着发霉的旧书，书页已经又黄又脆。

sentences.english: Melodious Sounds of stringed instrument and flute.

definition: crispy/thin and brittle/a crispy fried cracker
loose (soil, or limbs of a relaxed person etc)/flaky (pastry etc)
taste/texture (of food)/how food feels in the mouth
